banner.comeWithFamily: Come with family & feel the joy of mouthwatering food

SaigonStarter.title: Saigon Starter
SaigonStarter.description: For all adventurous gourmets, here are the most popular appetizers on a platter

DuckCurry.title: DUCK'N CURRY
DuckCurry.description: Crispy baked duck in a red coconut curry sauce, with fresh vegetables, basil, and jasmine-scented rice

BeefRicenoodles.title: BEEFâ€™N RICENOODLE
BeefRicenoodles.description: Rice noodles, tender beef, garlic, with a lime-ginger dressing

SpringrollsRicenoodle.title: SPRINGROLLS'N RICENOODLE
SpringrollsRicenoodle.description: Rice noodles, homemade spring rolls, garlic, onions, refined with Vietnamese herbs, seasoned with a lime-ginger dressing

TomaticSalmon.title: TOMATIC SALMON
TomaticSalmon.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet on a bed of wok-tossed vegetables with tomatoes, green onions, refined with Vietnamese herbs

CalamariOnTamarind.title: CALAMARI ON TAMARIND
CalamariOnTamarind.description: Crispy squid rings in a sweet-sour tamarind sauce, served with fresh salad and jasmine-scented rice
